YourLastHost – Company Relaunch Exclusive Offer

california, florida, france, jacksonville, los angeles June 24, 2017 @ 3:00 pm, by Matt Zelasko


Hello all! I haven’t been around that long, so maybe this has happened before, but it hasn’t occurred in the time that I’ve been here, so I’ll call this something new.

A while back we posted an offer from YourLastHost (you can find the offer here), and let’s just say that it was met with mixed reviews. As I mentioned before, I’m new to this community, but what I do know is that it’s difficult to run any small business. Sometimes you think you’ve got everything figured out and you’re ready to launch – and then everything just falls apart. I’m a firm believer in the value of learning from experiences, especially failure.

I’m going to let what Justin sent in speak for itself:

Short Bio:
YourLastHost was founded March 2016 and focused primarily in the LowEnd market. We are particularly proud to offer many features that cannot often be offered by many LowEnd companies, including 24/7 support, a 90-day money back guarantee, RAID-10 disks and dual processor nodes.
Changes/More Info:
After we were first listed on LowEndBox, we knew that we loved the community, but we also knew that we had some substantial changes to make, in order to ensure that customers really do have a positive experience with us. So, we took some time to regroup, and now we have prepared a re-launch of YourLastHost, specifically addressing and fixing past issues.
Improved Support
We have increased our support availability to be 24/7/365, and we are now offering live chat support during the business day.
New Locations
YourLastHost is now operating out of three distinct locations, France, Jacksonville, and Los Angeles. With such a diverse set of options, your customers are never far away from us.
Continuous Server Monitoring
We have written and thoroughly tested new scripts paired with our 24/7 NOC staff to proactively measure and correct high loads on our nodes.
Coming back to YLH?
For customers who were once YourLastHost clients and are interested in giving us a second try, they can contact us via the client area and have a 3-month credit applied to any unmanaged VPS, shared, or reseller hosting service.
Great Add-ons
-500GBPS of DDoS Protection available in Jacksonville for just $5/m per protected IP
-Snapshot backups can now be taken and set up on each individual VPS for $3/m
-Single domain SSL certificates available for your VPS for just $3.95/yr
YourLastHost is a registered company in Wyoming, filing ID #2016-000709357. Their WHOIS is public, and you can find their ToS here, and their AUP here. They accept PayPal and Stripe (major Credit/Debit) as methods of payment.
